website_summaries.verdict: The ideal down jacket for everyday wear from a consistently reliable brand.
pros: Jacket is moisture resistant, with 700 fill power down
Two interior pockets, sleeve pocket, and two zippered hand pockets
cons: Color not true to online photos
Sleeves are a little long for some customers

customer_reviews.title: 50 Degrees was bone chillingly painful but this was the perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Warm and cozy. Being Cali born for 25 years n moving to DC was a shock to my body come winter time. 50 Degrees was bone chillingly painful but this was the perfect solution! even when it was 20 degrees outside it felt like a nice 70 inside the jacket which turned my 6am car warm up from a near death experience on a daily basis to a walk on the beach on a warm summer (cali) day. Totally worth the incredibly high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydag

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Runs slightly small. I am 5 ft8 165pounds and I like a tight fit so I got a medium and it fits perfectly. Super warm in 25° weather. Haven’t tried in the rain though. One thing that’s unexpect ed is that it jet black looks awesome. Jacket has a much more European tailored look than the American jackets which I really like. Best winter jacket I have ever owned. UPDATE- I see some people taking a star off for the zipper getting stuck. This does happen rarely but it’s no biggie , takes 2extra seconds to get unstuck!
customer_reviews.author: yoyoma

customer_reviews.title: Extremely warm and quality coat
customer_reviews.text: This coat will keep you warm in any weather. It is a bit on the puffy side, but one of the warmest jackets I have ever owned. The quality is top notch with very nice zippers. There is a cord to tighten the waist are hidden in the front pockets, which I thought was rather innovative. Sometimes the zipper can get caught on the inside lining, but not anything serious enough to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Tyron

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is a really warm and nice jacket. I can skip the usual layers and just wear this over my top. I live in the NY region, this jacket is great for that. However, when the temperature hits closer to 50, this feels a tad too warm. Not complaining, this is a solid down jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: And fits well. I would buy a size larger than you need though to make room for sweaters and bulky shirts or if you have broad shoulders, like me.
customer_reviews.author: Teefy

customer_reviews.title: Jacket is very warm
customer_reviews.text: Warm coat, bought this jacket for my husband and right now it is very cold in Chicago . My husband stated he is warm in this jacket . Very well made for the very cold temperatures at -19 below zero.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some are fake
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm not reviewing 1 star because Amazon is taking care of it but CHECK TO MAKE SURE YOU GET THE RIGHT JACKET. I originally ordered the silver but decided I wanted black instead, but the jacket was AMAZING, the marmot stockholm is honestly the best jacket I've ever worn. However, the "replacement " I got was not at all the same jacket, not even close. None of the softness, different style, heavier, way cheaper feeling. It does have marmot labels but no new tag, and it has definitely been washed a few times. It might be a knock off. So yeah, the real deal is the best jacket ever but be diligent
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best down jacket I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best down jacket I have ever owned. Everything is just perfect. I chose size small and the fit is perfect. I am 5' 8" and 155 lb. Thank you Marmot for having a sensible sleeve length. I had a Marmot jacket in Small size with sleeve length 34 inches (only monkeys can wear it without alteration). I want to buy it in white if I can find one. I really look forward to wear it and go out side. This is a keeper. Really. Just get it.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Not enough down on the arms
customer_reviews.text: Chest and back have plenty of down the arms lack a bit. The sizing runs small. Fits well with a t-shirt but I struggle with a hoodie or sweatshirt under. The reviewers suggest ordering a size bigger which is true but I’m normally a 2xl and that’s the biggest size they sell. It seems warm enough with a sweatshirt but restricts your movement some.
customer_reviews.author: norvito velez

customer_reviews.title: Great winter jacekt
customer_reviews.text: Pros: iight weight, yet warm; very comfortable around neck; sleeve cuffs keep wind out; good pockets; quality zipper that doesn't jam. Con: silver color not a great choice to avoid stains in active use, but looks a lot better than the white outfit this guy in the photo is wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Like being wrapped in a cloud.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect winter jacket. Light, warm and great features like micro fleece on the wrists and a large hood. I relish the days when it drops below 20 degrees F so I can wear this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Odden

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: People that thought up this coat, we're just worried about maxing price point. Giving you so little that they make the most on every jacket. I expect more than a garbage bag with feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that thick!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket with great material but it is way 2 then for a 200 price tag. I like the look and fill but thought for the price it would have a thicker fill. It’s just needs more filling to make it thicker but over all nice, not that great for 200 in my option I’d pay 100 for this jacket just because it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm and zipper sticks to backing inside.
customer_reviews.text: A nice looking coat but I doubt it will hold up very well. I tried it on a 35 degree breezy day and it did not keep me warm, plus the zipper kept binding to the backing inside the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom In ABQ

customer_reviews.title: So warm
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is sooo warm, fits great, looks sexy, just a perfect 10!!
customer_reviews.author: James Stoebe

customer_reviews.title: Will keep me warm in Chicago weather
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jacket, great color, warm. A great down jacket for men
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is not smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Zipped is really hard to slide to open/close. I worry that if I pull it any harder, the zipper knob is going to break. And I'm not sure if I'll be able to close it when I'm wearing gloves and cold. As a result I use it for gardening, instead of the mountains. There were cheaper options for a backyard jacket.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Nice parka
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well constructed. It's a bit warm to wear it now. They do run 1 size small. Order up. Get back to everyone once it gets colder
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B

customer_reviews.title: Great for Chicago Winters
customer_reviews.text: This coat is very warm, and comfortable. The hood is a little large, and I should have ordered a size smaller than I usually wear. I'm 5'6 1/2, 155 lbs, and the medium is a pretty loose on me. But it makes Chicago winters more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got a jacket I'd never heard of before. WRONG JACKET
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket that costs $ 275 dollars and received another brand (Ben Sherman) that cost $ 30, and the wrong jacket was still defective. Inadmissible this mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baum

customer_reviews.title: Shiny new jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket as it should be for that much money.
customer_reviews.author: rufusmortis

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting jacket, light but very warm.
customer_reviews.text: Well padded but not bulky, very warm, used with just a dress shirt in temperatures of 15F and gale force winds.
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: What a PUFFER!!! LOL
customer_reviews.text: What a great quality! My dad loves it! Very Very warm for winter time and looking very good on him! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Pan_ams16

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking jacket that actually keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this jacket! Detail at the wrist stops cold air from getting in & 700 down fill is warm without being heavy to wear. This is a cool looking jacket that actually does its job.
customer_reviews.author: anitra

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Best jacket I’ve owned. It’s super light weight, extremely warm, and fits perfect. What more can you ask for. The steel color does dirty up quick but this jacket can also be washed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: WARM WITHOUT WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: great for northern michigan winters. especially when taking the dog out at 3 am.
customer_reviews.author: james d rogers

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with this. high quality. warm. great price to quality
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished?
customer_reviews.text: I wore the jacket almost immediately. I noticed far too many feathers started coming out of the jacket also the stitching was extremely uneven in many areas of the jacket
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good jacket, very warm. I like to Ware only a t-shirt under the jacket. Not good for weather under 30 degrees unless you have a good sweater on. Sadly, not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm at below zero!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light weight coat. Keeps you really warm in cold conditions. Wore it to Jackson hole last week the temp were 5 to 15 below zero and I stayed comfortable warm in it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dascanio

customer_reviews.title: solid for the winter season
customer_reviews.text: comfy feel well insulated sizable zippers so you are not fumbling with closing coat. Good look.
customer_reviews.author: Ra-Set

customer_reviews.title: Classy Coat Has My Vote!
customer_reviews.text: Coat arrived right on time and it is an excellent fit. Good room in the shoulders if you're a little broader, and very warm for such a light weight coat! Nice shine and classiness to it as well. It makes your knock off puffers look shameful in comparison. Little pricey, but you really do get what you pay for with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I like the  Coat a lot
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect. Haven't been able to wear it in the winner yet.
customer_reviews.author: reuniti

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket very warm! Very lightweight gets the job done and looks even better in person!
customer_reviews.author: Pedsnurse1

customer_reviews.title: Arctic Blast BeatDown
customer_reviews.text: Unreal for harsh cold. Cuts wind out and keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Hornig

customer_reviews.title: Down jackets don’t get better than this!
customer_reviews.text: Best men’s puffy ever. Good quality materials, luxuriously soft, total freedom of movement.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaJane

customer_reviews.title: I especially liked the hood which can be tightened around my ears ...LIGHTWEIGHT AND WARM!
customer_reviews.text: This coat is fabulous. it is lightweight and warm. I especially liked the hood which can be tightened around my ears to keep my head warm!!
customer_reviews.author: weeb behall

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat!
customer_reviews.text: Great coat! Fit well, light weight but warm! Bought it for an Alaskan Cruise, it will pack well and keep me warm! Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Male

customer_reviews.title: Velcro damaging the fabric of the jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice design amd warm but quality of the fabric is very thin. It has been around 3 weeks that we got it and the fabric looks already worn out. The velcro from the hood has scratched and damaged one side of the jacket. Very unpractical it’s a pitty.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Khanzadian

customer_reviews.title: Let’s see how it goes first
customer_reviews.text: Looks navy color but I got the jet black , feathers coming out rapidly , just return to get my money back don’t buy it guys
customer_reviews.author: Benny carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. More than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Warm, soft and comfortable! I love this coat. Best purchase of the year, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. It fits me well and for a big puffer doesn’t make me feel huge. Super warm and cozy. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jacket from Marmot
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Fits perfectly. I'm 5'8 175lbs. Got the large. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: No I’m pressed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a coat that’s why I did not return but the coat had death Er a coming out daily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and  very warm
customer_reviews.text: Using 2-3 times per week as weather gets colder. Very warm coat. Lowest temperature so far was - 6 F.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew about this coat years ago, warm comfortable well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with coat
customer_reviews.text: Functional and as described. Warm and light coat delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome D. Groskind

customer_reviews.title: This will get you through the winter.
customer_reviews.text: Warm. Great pockets with a great hood. Handles the elements with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I thought it would be. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: China

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: More than what me and my son expected. He loves this coat more than his previous marmot and he keeps the hood on. Worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: Trina Henderson

product_meta.title: Marmot Men's Stockholm Down Puffer Jacket, Fill Power 700
product_meta.description: Men's down puffer jacket ideal for fashionable urban winter wear; made from lightweight, high Cire, down-proof fabric, Fabric: 100% Nylon Shiny Plain Weave 1.4 oz/yd
feature_bullets: Men's down puffer jacket ideal for casual, everyday urban winter wear
Lightweight, high ciré, down proof fabric adds style and comfort; Elastic drawcord hem
Moisture resistant down defender treatment on 700 fill power down improves warmth in wet conditions
Zip off hood lets you adjust for comfort and style; Center back length 27.25 inches
Zippered hand pockets, zippered sleeve pocket, zippered interior pocket, and interior mobile office pocket provide warmth, security, and storage; Machine wash
